programme.title: Blue Planet Now - EP 1

From the Namib Desert to Patagonia, only a handful of places on Earth can claim to be largely unchanged. Isolated from the rest of the world, these places have been protected from the most damaging effects of human interference. Delicately balanced, species-rich, unique ecosystems. In these lands, life exists as nature intended.

programme.title: L'imagier Anime De Koumi - EP 21
programme.desc: At 6 years old the cheerful mischievous Koumi dreams of knowing all the animals in the world. Thanks to her picture book, she's able to head off and meet them.

programme.title: Taffy - EP 52
programme.desc: Wealthy Mrs. Muchmore lives in a manor with her beloved dog Bentley. One day, Scraggs the raccoon turns up disguised as a cat. Immediately adopted by the old lady, he becomes Taffy and laps up her attention. But Bentley is not fooled and decides to chase him off his territory.

programme.title: Kididoc - EP 35
programme.desc: Kidi, a kind-hearted artificial intelligence, guides Pomme and Fix on their journey through Kidi-World. From dinosaurs to the Chateau de Versailles, the human body to the history of aviation: Kidi-World is not only an adventure-filled wonderland but also, and above all, a means of finding the answer to every question.

Fortunately his wiser more responsible older sister, Yara, always has the time to explain things, offering the perfect opportunity for Nubu to dive into his own comic book world.

programme.title: 1001 Moyen-Ages - EP 23

programme.title: Dessine-Moi Les Etoiles - EP 6
programme.desc: Science explained by cartoon artist Fiami, through questions asked by two children. Further explanations from a philosopher and an astronomer help popularize science and envision it as a great human adventure.

programme.title: Quasimodo - EP 17
programme.desc: Paris, 1483. 16-year-old Quasimodo is a hunchbacked orphan. One day, the gypsy Esmeralda, with whom he is in love, finds herself in trouble. He sacrifices himself to save her and ends up in prison. And so begins a long series of adventures...

programme.title: Pfffirates - EP 9

But it'll take more than that to deflate Pat, Lily and Stede: the threesome feel invincible!

programme.title: Echappees Belles - EP 32
programme.desc: Australia, an immense country-continent of some 7,690,000 km2. Sophie Jovillard takes us from Sydney to Melbourne, two of the country's most emblematic cities. We meet a population of nature-lovers. Which is hardly surprising given that both cities lie on the coast and are surrounded by nature at its most unspoilt.

programme.title: Un Dimanche A La Campagne
programme.desc: A weekend together, far from the hustle and bustle of everyday life. A moment out of time to get to know one another, talk of love, friendship, life. In a house open to surprises and the unexpected, between emotion and laughter, each reveals the invisible thread of their personal story...

programme.title: Tendance XXI - EP 25
programme.desc: French creativity is booming in the fields of fashion, crafts, design, beauty and gastronomy. 'Tendance XXI' showcases a know-how that evolves in tune with the times, sometimes even anticipating them.

programme.title: Remorques
programme.desc: After having assisted a ship in danger, Captain Andre Laurent takes the passengers on board his vessel. Amongst them is Catherine, with whom he falls in love and who becomes his mistress. As he is about to leave his wife Yvonne, Andre learns that she is seriously ill...

programme.title: Linge Sale
programme.desc: Arthur's solitary life is peaceful and well-organised. The arrival of his younger brother Theo, who he hasn't seen for ages, disturbs his orderly existence and throws him completely off balance.

programme.title: Jesus 2020
programme.desc: Claire is responsible for the PR plan for a small parish. Distinctly short of motivation she allows herself to be caught up in the enthusiasm of young Father Vianney. The result is a campaign that is so successful that Jesus himself seems to have replied, via a Twitter account.

programme.title: Complement D'enquete - EP 3
programme.desc: A current affairs investigation magazine taking its theme from current headlines and alternating film reports and studio guests.

programme.title: Geopolitis
programme.desc: Analysis, explanations, neutrality... ''Geopolitis'' offers an unbiased in-depth look at international current affairs, with accuracy, precision and a constant desire to make an increasingly complex and conflictual world easier to understand.

programme.title: Version Francaise - EP 24
programme.desc: Chateau de Cadillac, its rich and multi-facetted history bearing witness to France's 17th century heritage. Artist and cabinet-maker, Kostia combines tradition and innovative design. Dries Van Noten bids farewell with a collection faithful to his years of work. From micro to macro-embroidery, Cyrielle Leclere explores the limits of traditional craftwork.

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En Francais - 1re Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: Face Au Climat - EP 2
programme.desc: A drought-struck island in the Mediterranean... Welcome to Cyprus! Anne Quemere meets some of its inhabitants whose daily lives face dramatic changes due to the ever-increasing scarcity of water. Scientists, farmers and engineers work relentlessly to develop new solutions to protect and save their arid lan

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rtbf
programme.desc: Complete international news roundup presented by the RTBF news staff.

programme.title: Internationales - EP 10
programme.desc: A major interview focusing on world news, proposed by TV5MONDE.

programme.title: Les Voyageurs Solidaires - EP 2
programme.desc: French singer and musician Flo Delavega discovers Ibiza, one of Spain's Balearic Islands. Famous for its nightlife, each year this party capital attracts thousands of visitors: a combination of mass tourism and general excess. We meet the ecocitizens committed to preserving their island.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rts
programme.desc: All the news from RTS.

programme.title: Le Journal De France 2
programme.desc: The television news programme of the France 2 editorial board (8 p.m. edition, Paris time).

programme.title: L'arc De Triomphe, Passion D'une Nation
programme.desc: Morning parades, afternoon riots, evening celebrations... The central point of one of the world's most beautiful urban perspectives, the Arc de Triomphe polarises passion. Napoleonic victories, German humiliation in 1940, sporting successes, the anger of the Yellow Vests, wrapped up by Christo: a historical portrait of an emblematic Parisian monument.

programme.title: Littoral - EP 1
programme.desc: A magazine about the people of the sea. An invitation to set sail for a programme rich in voyages, discoveries and fascinating encounters with those for whom the sea is their life, the ocean-lovers and the high-seas adventurers.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Levy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: La Bataille Pour La Foret - EP 2
programme.desc: A focus on the contradictions of the forestry industry and an interview with Louis Pelletier, Quebec's chief forester since 2016.

programme.title: Les Rois De La Comedie : Fernandel, Jacques Tati, Bourvil, Louis De Funes
programme.desc: A look back at the filmography of French comedy four icons. Fernandel, Jacques Tati, Bourvil and Louis de Funes all met success, simultaneously, at the end of the 1950s, in front of or behind the camera. How did they become box-office stars? What was life like being so immensely popular?

programme.title: Le 6h00 Info
programme.desc: The 6am news bulletin (Paris time) by the France Televisions editorial team.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week With Flavie Flament and Julien Arnaud on weekdays, Maya Lauque and Damien Thevenot at weekends.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week With Flavie Flament and Julien Arnaud on weekdays, Maya Lauque and Damien Thevenot at weekends.

programme.title: Chef Pays - EP 2
programme.desc: Chef Sanjee prepares an Indian green curry with coconut milk.

programme.title: Slam
programme.desc: Three contestants compete in a game of arrow crosswords, trying to complete the grids by finding the answers to the definitions provided. But to have access to those definitions, they first need to answer questions that all share one common characteristic: the response is always a letter.

programme.title: Le Journal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: La Bataille Pour La Foret - EP 2
programme.desc: A focus on the contradictions of the forestry industry and an interview with Louis Pelletier, Quebec's chief forester since 2016.

programme.title: Les Quiquoi - EP 8
programme.desc: Olive, Petole, Boulard, Mixo, Raoul and Pamela make up a full-of-fun gang known as the Quiquoi. Together they ask a host of existential questions, using drawings to find the answers. In their own quirky way, they love nothing better than creating surrealist worlds where everything becomes possible.

programme.title: Les Quiquoi - EP 9
programme.desc: Olive, Petole, Boulard, Mixo, Raoul and Pamela make up a full-of-fun gang known as the Quiquoi. Together they ask a host of existential questions, using drawings to find the answers. In their own quirky way, they love nothing better than creating surrealist worlds where everything becomes possible.

programme.title: Gigantosaurus - EP 6
programme.desc: Four little dinosaurs, Rocky, Bill, Tiny and Mazu, discover a dangerous world where the mysterious Gigantosaurus, the most ferocious of all the dinosaurs, is forever on the prowl. The four best friends set their heading for adventure, confronting their fears and working together to solve all their problems.

programme.title: Toc Toc ! - EP 21
programme.desc: Whenever an animal is stressed or bothered about something, they head straight to see Claude the bull. Well-known as a doctor for minor ills, he is particularly skilled in soothing everyday troubles and resolving misunderstandings. With Claude's help, the animals learn to love themselves as they are: imperfect.

programme.title: Les Mutants - EP 20
programme.desc: As Julianne refuses to see Bertrand again because of their mutations, Nicky decides to go to Zoe's dermatologist in town alone. Meanwhile, Marcus wants to help Dahlia convince Agrotek that she's still trustworthy, even though she's found the poison...

programme.title: Vendee Globe 2024
programme.desc: Daily summary of the 10th Vendee Globe, non-stop solo sailing race around the world with no assistance. The skippers cover around 45,000 km crossing the world, passing the Cape of Good Hope, Cape Leeuwin and Cape Horn. Arrival and departure: Les Sables d'Olonne.

programme.title: Chef Pays - EP 2
programme.desc: Chef Sanjee prepares an Indian green curry with coconut milk.

programme.title: Questions Pour Un Champion
programme.desc: A general knowledge quiz.

programme.title: Au Bout De L'enquete, La Fin Du Crime Parfait ?
programme.desc: They are all cases that were closed, considered unsolvable, sometimes resisting police efforts for decades until a forgotten clue, an unhoped-for witness or a forensic innovation finally made it possible to unmask the culprit. Alongside Marie Drucker, the criminologist Alain Bauer explains the technical, psychological, sociological or historical elements involved.

programme.title: TV5 Monde, Le Journal
programme.desc: All the national and international news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: Des Racines Et Des Ailes - EP 2
programme.desc: Trails winding their way through the heart of the Alps, impressive mountains seemingly impossible to pass yet where goods and people have always crossed between Switzerland and Italy: Savoy is brimming with little-known treasures. Enthusiastic hikers and heritage-lovers are today working to make them better-known.

programme.title: Foot! (1/2)
programme.desc: Match summaries, commentary and analyses, after each day of the Ligue 1 McDonald's, the French football championship.

programme.title: Foot! (2/2)
programme.desc: Match summaries, commentary and analyses, after each day of the Ligue 1 McDonald's, the French football championship.

programme.title: La Ligne De Partage Des Eaux
programme.desc: Dominique Marchais takes a waterside walk to explore the emblematic Loire river basin. And asks political, ecological and existential questions: how can we best develop the area in the general interest? How can we modernise without destroying past achievements? How can we live together?

programme.title: THE BIG INTERVIEW - EP 15
programme.desc: Now in their 4th season in the Premier League, Brentford have established themselves as an astute, well drilled side under Thomas Frank. This week, The Big Interview sits down with the head coach in a local cinema as he talks through the club's time in the top flight. He'll also reveal how he's helped maintain their status with tactical clips of his side's defensive and offensive play.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 25
programme.desc: We delve into the remarkable journey of Argentine football legend Hernán Crespo. From his early days as a striker with clubs like Parma, Lazio, and Chelsea, to his evolution into a title winning coach, Crespo's career has been filled with highs and challenges. We follow his transition from player to manager and join him at Al Ain, where we get a look into how he navigates the pressures and ambitions of managing one of the UAE's top football clubs.

programme.title: CLASSIC MATCH 14/15

programme.title: Aston Villa vs Crystal Palace (MW12) (Live) - EP 114
programme.desc: The 33rd season of the Premier League sees Manchester City defend its title against a host of teams keen for glory themselves. 20 teams are in the mix but only 1 champion will emerge ultimately.

programme.title: PL Stories 2024/25 - EP 25
programme.desc: We delve into the remarkable journey of Argentine football legend Hernán Crespo. From his early days as a striker with clubs like Parma, Lazio, and Chelsea, to his evolution into a title winning coach, Crespo's career has been filled with highs and challenges. We follow his transition from player to manager and join him at Al Ain, where we get a look into how he navigates the pressures and ambitions of managing one of the UAE's top football clubs.

programme.title: Manchester City vs Tottenham Hotspur (MW12) (Live) - EP 117
programme.desc: Manchester City have won just three of their last 10 Premier League games against Tottenham (D2 L5) and are looking to win consecutive meetings with them for the first time since April 2019.

programme.title: The Big Interview 2024/25 - EP 15
programme.desc: Now in their 4th season in the Premier League, Brentford have established themselves as an astute, well drilled side under Thomas Frank. This week, The Big Interview sits down with the head coach in a local cinema as he talks through the club’s time in the top flight. He’ll also reveal how he’s helped maintain their status with tactical clips of his side’s defensive and offensive play.

programme.title: 1-to-11 2024/25 - EP 6
programme.desc: Former Premier League goalkeeper Rob Green joins Will Perry to select the best team consisting of players he shared a Premier League pitch with.

programme.title: Fulham vs Wolverhampton Wanderers (MW12) - EP 116
programme.desc: Wolves haven’t won successive Premier League matches since February last season, while on the road they’re winless in their last 11 league matches (D4 L7), conceding 28 goals in that time.

programme.title: Everton vs Brentford (MW12) - EP 115
programme.desc: Brentford have lost all five of their Premier League away games this season; only in 1924-25 (9) and 1961-62 (9) have they ever lost each of their opening six or more away matches of a league campaign.

programme.title: Arsenal vs Nottingham Forest (MW12) - EP 113
programme.desc: Arsenal have won six of their last seven Premier League games against Nottingham Forest, with the exception being a 1-0 loss at the City Ground in May 2023.

programme.title: Match Day Live Extra 2024/25 - EP 12
programme.desc: Tim Sherwood and Shaun Wright-Phillips are in the studio to dissect all of the major talking points from a 7-game Saturday in the Premier League, including Manchester City v Tottenham.

programme.title: Manchester City vs Tottenham Hotspur (MW12) - EP 117
programme.desc: Manchester City have won just three of their last 10 Premier League games against Tottenham (D2 L5) and are looking to win consecutive meetings with them for the first time since April 2019.

programme.title: Aston Villa vs Crystal Palace (MW12) - EP 114
programme.desc: Aston Villa have lost just one of their 12 Premier League home games against Crystal Palace (W7 D4), never conceding more than once in any of these 12 meetings (6 goals conceded in total).

programme.title: Leicester City vs Chelsea (MW12) - EP 111
programme.desc: After a six-game unbeaten run against Chelsea in the Premier League between 2018 and 2021 (W2 D4), Leicester have now lost four of their last five against the Blues (D1).

programme.desc: Former Premier League goalkeeper Rob Green joins Will Perry to select the best team consisting of players he shared a Premier League pitch with.

programme.title: Karate 1 Premier League
programme.desc: Dublin, Ireland welcomes one of the most anticipated events in Martial Arts this year as the Karate 1 Premier League returns. This will be the first Karate 1 Premier League event to take place in Dublin, with many of the top competitors in the world making the journey to Ireland for the first time and where the new Grand Winners will be crowned.

programme.title: MMA:30
programme.desc: This episode features Michael Bisping as he talks about his fame, Dominick Cruz in the announcer's booth and Tito Ortiz shows off his house.

programme.title: MEGA Fights Joe Calzaghe vs Roy Jones Jr.
programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. This episode features a light heavyweight championship match between Joe Calzaghe (45-0, 32 KOs) and Roy Jones Jr. (52-4, 38 KOs) from Madison Square Garden in New York City, New York, USA, on November 8, 2008.

programme.title: WCCB Live Tina Rupprecht vs. Eri Matsuda
programme.desc: LIVE November 23rd from Heidelberg, Germany, a championship tripleheader takes place headlined by Tina Rupprecht of Germany and Eri Matsuda of Japan competing for the WBC and WBO Women's Atomweight World Championships. Also on the card will be undefeated World Champion Sumire Yamanaka, also of Japan, defending the IBF Atomweight World Title against Fabiana Bytyqi. Rounding out the card will a European Heavyweight Title clash featuring Oleksandr Zakhozhyi against Arnold Gjergjaj.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Sergio Martinez vs. Darren Barker
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is a middleweight title fight between champion Sergio Martinez and up-and-coming European middleweight Darren Baker that ends with a right hook blast. Also on the card, action from 5-time champion Timothy Bradley.

programme.title: MEGA Fights Joe Calzaghe vs Roy Jones Jr.
programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. This episode features a light heavyweight championship match between Joe Calzaghe (45-0, 32 KOs) and Roy Jones Jr. (52-4, 38 KOs) from Madison Square Garden in New York City, New York, USA, on November 8, 2008.

programme.title: FIGHT SPORTS WCK Youssef Challouki vs Frederic Berichon
programme.desc: WCK features intense, nonstop battles in both freestyle kickboxing and Muay Thai from around the world. It's kickboxing's most talented athletes at their finest! This episode, from Sallanches, France, features Youssef Challouki (Belgium) vs. Frederic Berichon (France). Bonus coverage includes Marvin Monteiro vs. Michael Palandre.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Sergio Martinez vs. Darren Barker
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is a middleweight title fight between champion Sergio Martinez and up-and-coming European middleweight Darren Baker that ends with a right hook blast. Also on the card, action from 5-time champion Timothy Bradley.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 3 featuring Mitakeumi, Shohozan, Shodai and Kakuryu from the Natsu basho, 2018.

programme.title: Karate 1 Premier League
programme.desc: Dublin, Ireland welcomes one of the most anticipated events in Martial Arts this year as the Karate 1 Premier League returns. This will be the first Karate 1 Premier League event to take place in Dublin, with many of the top competitors in the world making the journey to Ireland for the first time and where the new Grand Winners will be crowned.

programme.title: MMA:30
programme.desc: This episode features Michael Bisping as he talks about his fame, Dominick Cruz in the announcer's booth and Tito Ortiz shows off his house.

programme.title: FS MMA Mamed Khalidov vs. Scott Askham II
programme.desc: This episode of FIGHT SPORTS MMA showcases action from KSW 55 in Warsaw, Poland, highlighted by a rematch for the KSW Middleweight Championship between titleholder Scott Askham and challenger Mamed Khalidov. Askham, of the UK and formerly of the UFC, has won five straight contests including a victory over Khalidov via unanimous decision. Now the two are set to run it back again with the Middleweight Title on the line. It's Askham vs. Khalidov, on FIGHT SPORTS.

programme.desc: In this episode, World Boxing Council (WBC) No. 1 contender Kim Clavel (15-0, 3 KOs) faces WBC Flyweight World Champion Yesenia Gomez (19-5-3, 6 KOs), who will defend her world title belt for the fifth time, at the Cabaret of Montreal Casino in Canada.

programme.title: Fight Quest
programme.desc: Episode 8: Rio de Janeiro, Brazil - Hosts Jimmy Smith and Doug Anderson learn the Fight Discipline of Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu and the Martial Art of Grappling with Masters Renato Barreto and Breno Sivak.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Floyd Mayweather vs. Juan Manuel Marquez
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is Floyd Mayweather's return to boxing after a 21-month retirement. He takes on Juan Manuel Marquez in a fight that saw 1 million pay-per-view buys for a revenue of $52 million. Also on the card, action from a young Sergey Kovalev.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 4 featuring Takarafuji, Yoshikaze, Takakeisho and Daishomaru from the Natsu basho, 2018.

programme.title: American Ninja Warrior
programme.desc: 100 finalists from across the country congregate on the Las Vegas strip for the American Ninja Warrior finals. This course consists of four stages to test the contestants' strength, speed and agility. In front of the finish line stands the massive metal monster, Mount Midoriyama with its daunting 77-foot Rope Climb. Can any of the contestants complete the challenges presented by The World's Most Difficult Obstacle Course? Part 5 of 5

programme.title: FIGHT SPORTS MMA Dricus du Plessis vs. Martin Van Staden
programme.desc: This episode features coverage of mixed martial arts headlined by a welterweight title fight between Dricus du Plessis and Martin Van Staden. Bonus coverage includes a lightweight battle between Mthobisi Buthelezi and Luke Michael and a bantamweight clash between Bill Thusi and Tjaart Henning.

programme.title: Greatest Classics Mike Tyson vs. Sammy Scaff
programme.desc: The talk of the boxing world takes center stage as a young Mike Tyson displays the lethal combination of speed and power that would later make him a World Champion. Tyson enters the Felt Forum in New York City with a 13-0 record, having knocked out every opponent he's faced thus far, with 9 of those knockouts coming in the first round.

programme.title: FIGHT SPORTS WCK Ulrik Bokeme vs Hicham El Gaoui
programme.desc: WCK features intense, nonstop battles in both freestyle kickboxing and Muay Thai from around the world. It's kickboxing's most talented athletes at their finest! This episode, from Sallanches, France, features main event Hicham El Gaoui of Morrocco as he looks to ruin the Congo's Ulrik Bokeme's perfect record.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Saul (Canelo) Alvarez vs. Shane Mosley
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is then-unbeaten Saul "Canelo" Alvarez in what might yet be his toughest challenge in his career, as he defends the WBC light middleweight championship against "Sugar" Shane Mosley. Also on the card, action from former light heavyweight champ Adonis Stevenson.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 5 featuring Kakuryu, Tochinoshin, Shodai and Hakuho from the Natsu basho, 2018.

programme.title: Prison Fighters
programme.desc: This series follows former Muay Thai champion Noy Khaopan and American Cody Moberly, two inmates in a Thailand prison, who after seven years are given the chance to fight for their release. By joining a controversial government modern day Prison Fight program, murderers and felons are given the chance to fight for their freedom, and possible redemption, through the ancient tradition of Muay Thai matches. Episode 2 of 4.

programme.title: MMA:30
programme.desc: This episode features a look at rising star Ryan "Darth" Bader. We go over BMX bike jumps with heavyweight Roy "Big Country" Nelson. And MMA:30 takes you inside the training camp of stud wrestler Phil Davis and we take a look at Bellator's duel promotional event Dynamite.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 5
programme.desc: Happy has always loved the water. But while swimming around in his paddling pool at the playhouse, Duggee reminds the Squirrels that there was a time when Happy feared water!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 6
programme.desc: When the Squirrels can't figure out if fish have noses, Duggee shows them his library. But when the Squirrels realise no-one is visiting it, they have an idea...

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 7
programme.desc: The Squirrels are crafting in the Clubhouse when Betty saves Tag from throwing water across the table instead of glitter.

programme.desc: A giant grimbot bounces down the valley of Machu Picchu. Can the Go Jetters stop him?

programme.title: Go Jetters (S2) - EP 7
programme.desc: GrimHQ crashes into the Baobab trees. Can the Go Jetters rescue a baby lemur in time?

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 1
programme.desc: For her Father's Day card, Bluey sets out to draw a picture of herself and her father together. While recalling her favourite memories of playing with Bandit, Bluey struggles with the idea that her drawing must be perfect. Chilli tries to convince Bluey that perfection isn't easy, or absolutely necessary.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 2
programme.desc: Chilli and Bandit transform the old nursery into a new bedroom for Bluey. In the process, Bluey and Bingo amicably divide their belongings, but get absorbed by trading items and swapping notes at bedtime. Ultimately, when Bluey misses her sister, she asks to return to her old room.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 3
programme.desc: Chilli sets up an obstacle course in the backyard, but Bluey is disheartened when Bandit turns it into a race and beats her. After cheating in a rematch, Bluey discovers the importance of training in order to improve her skills.

programme.title: Teletubbies (S1) - EP 73
programme.desc: The Tubby Car takes the Teletubbies to the Hidey Hup where they discover the Tubby Slidey. Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po have great fun sliding down again and again.

programme.title: Teletubbies Ready Steady Go! (S1) - EP 6
programme.desc: Join the dance party with the Teletubbies! Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po dance and sing and follow their dreams.

programme.title: Pop Paper City (S1) - EP 2
programme.desc: Plom and his friends want to put on a play for Helping Hand - but what should it be?

programme.title: Tinpo (S1) - EP 17
programme.desc: After a shaky start, the team discovers an easy way to pick apples.

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO (S1) - EP 13
programme.desc: Messy, a monster, explores science questions that children ask about the world around us. Messy finds a very dusty sock underneath his bed, but why does it make him teary? He goes to OKIDO to find out.

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO (S1) - EP 14
programme.desc: Messy, a monster, explores science questions that children ask about the world around us. Messy wants to know how his goldfish friend can stay underwater for so long. He goes to OKIDO to find out.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) - EP 28
programme.desc: Monty wonders if it is possible to feel both happy and sad at the same time.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran (S1) - EP 3
programme.desc: It's time to check the weather forecast'. JoJo is determined to slide down the big slide at the park. But rainy weather forecast threatens her plans.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran (S1) - EP 2
programme.desc: JoJo and Gran Gran miss their bus home, so the pair settle down to wait for the next one. But getting the bus isn't quite as simple as JoJo thinks it is.

programme.desc: John has a problem with the origami flamingos he has made and needs Sarah and Duck's help.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S2) - EP 13
programme.desc: The Shallots have discovered acrobatics and are inspired to put on a show.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends (S23) - EP 5
programme.desc: Rajiv feels devastated when he loses his crown, thinking that it's the reason he is good at anything, but he soon learns that can still be really useful.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) - EP 39
programme.desc: A sleepover with their cousin means Bluey and Bingo get to stay up late! But when Muffin shows up exhausted after missing her nap, the girls get more fun than they bargained for.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) - EP 40
programme.desc: Bluey's playgroup is at odds when Indy's baby hospital collides with Rusty's knights and dragons. But in explaining themselves, they both find that their games actually have a lot in common.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) - EP 41
programme.desc: When Indy and Rusty play Mums and Dads, they can't agree on who should go to work, so they part company. Indy has a hard time finding a babysitter, while Bluey makes Rusty her baby.

programme.title: Supertato (S1) - EP 27
programme.desc: Evil Pea blows all the lanterns away during the Lantern Festival. Supertato struggles to get them all back and needs Broccoli's help to save the day.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) - EP 41
programme.desc: The Squirrels are close to finishing a jigsaw puzzle.

programme.desc: The Squirrels find a hidden book about mythical creatures.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) - EP 43
programme.desc: The Squirrels accidentally break the Chickens' TV aerial!

programme.title: Go Jetters (S2) - EP 19
programme.desc: Glitch sinks in the Panama Canal and needs saving... again.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S2) - EP 20
programme.desc: Grandmaster Glitch is visiting London and spots the perfect souvenir hat. But he's run out of pocket money, so he decides to earn some as a tour guide.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S2) - EP 21
programme.desc: Xuli and Glitch need rescuing from a sinkhole.

programme.title: My World Kitchen (S3) - EP 12
programme.desc: Sonny-Mac has invited his friends to dress up for a tea party where he serves banoffi pie. Thought to have been invented in Sussex, it is made using banana, biscuits, cream and dates.

programme.title: Andy's Safari Adventures (S1) - EP 28
programme.desc: When some new South American sea lions arrive at the park, it's up to Andy to find out many fish they like to eat.

programme.title: Swashbuckle (S7) - EP 25
programme.desc: Squawk takes us on a journey to find Sandy and Seaweed's top Swashbuckle moments, their super snippets, which are all hidden along a pirate treasure map.

programme.title: Panda and Krash (S1) - EP 5
programme.desc: The toys are playing for the toyshop blowing championship.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) - EP 24
programme.desc: Bluey can't wait to get to the monkey bars as Dad takes her and Bingo on a wagon ride to the park. But her patience is tested when Dad keeps stopping to chat with other grown-ups.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) - EP 25
programme.desc: Bluey is running a taxi service. Her first passenger is Businessman Dad, who is in a rush to get to the airport. But with unexpected delays, Dad's in danger of missing his flight!

programme.title: Bluey (S1) - EP 26

programme.desc: The twins visit Barbabright's room. // If I were a billionaire, what would I do to achieve my dreams?

programme.title: Hamsters of Hamsterdale S1 - EP 106
programme.desc: The hamsters must stop Kendrick's old recliner from being thrown out. // When a mama bird thinks Lil Pal is her lost chick, the hamsters rescue their friend.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S7 - EP 711
programme.desc: When the Yucky Ducky covers Axle City in icky, sticky grossigoo, it's up to Special Mission Blaze to stop her machine and save the world from being grossified... forever!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S4 - EP 410
programme.desc: When Space Commander Megan is marooned on Pluto, our robot heroes will race through wormholes, shoot past ice volcanoes, and blast straight through an asteroid field to bring their new friend back home.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S3 - EP 311
programme.desc: Ryder and the pups must fly to the Arctic in the Air Patroller to rescue the lost cubs. // When little lambs keep running away from Farmer Al's pasture, it's up to the Paw Patrol to find the missing sheep.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S3 - EP 312
programme.desc: When all the tires on the Adventure Bay school bus blow out, Ryder volunteers to use the Paw Patroller as a substitute school bus. // When the famous singing songbirds of Adventure Bay go missing, it's PAW Patrol to the rescue!

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S1 - EP 101
programme.desc: Rubble and his construction pup family gear up to build a bridge, only to find the villainous Speed Meister has a different idea. It's up to Rubble & Crew to work together and save the day by building a new, safe bridge to Builder Cove.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S1 - EP 102
programme.desc: Rubble and the pups work to build a big bike shop in time for the Bike Festival... unless Speed Meister beats them to it! // When Motor won't take a bath before their family photo, it's up to Rubble and the pups to find a construction solution.

programme.desc: Dora and Boots meet Shelly, a hermit crab missing her shell, who uses one of Boots' boots. Dora travels across the beach in search of her old shell. // Papi is having a quesadilla picnic, but he forgot the ingredients! Dora sets off to deliver them.

programme.desc: When Baby and William help the Mail Whale with his deliveries, they find themselves on a whale of an adventure. // Baby and his family get their own reality TV show-- what could go wrong?

programme.title: Sharkdog S2 - EP 213
programme.desc: The Sharkpack are excited to watch the meteor shower on Foggy Springs's highest mountain, and Sharkdog knows the best way to get there. The only problem? Captain Quigley thinks she does too.

programme.title: Sharkdog S2 - EP 214
programme.desc: Sharkdog has fleas! Sea fleas, that is. Max will do whatever it takes to get rid of them, but that may be tough because Sharkdog is so itchy, he can't sit still!

programme.title: Sharkdog S2 - EP 215
programme.desc: Sharkdog must go on a wild search around town to help Mia find her missing binky and get the baby back to sleep.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 - EP 226
programme.desc: Pedro Pony wears glasses. Peppa thinks she might need glasses too, so Mummy Pig takes her to the optician. Peppa is a little disappointed to discover that she has perfect vision - but that doesn't stop her wearing some rather fabulous sunglasses.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 - EP 227
programme.desc: The grass has grown so long that Peppa and George's ball gets lost. Grandpa arrives with his fantastic lawnmower and gets the grass cut in no time. Peppa and George find their plastic ball again and it bounces brilliantly on the short grass!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 - EP 228
programme.desc: Mr. Zebra the Postman gets help from his daughter Zoe. Zoe has a very special letter for Peppa and George; an invitation to her birthday party. The party is fun, especially as it turns out that Zoe has invited all of Peppa and George's friends.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 - EP 229
programme.desc: Peppa and George are painting. Daddy shows them how to mix paints and the three of them paint a beautiful picture of a cherry tree. Everything is going very well, until the ducks turn up and decide to run through the paint and all over the painting.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S1 - EP 105
programme.desc: Tiny Chef bakes cookies to welcome a lady bug who moves into the neighborhood. // Tiny Chef makes snap pea stir fry and learns that his friends are good kitchen helpers when he has trouble cooking on his own.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 - EP 102
programme.desc: Barbabright captured a melody from Mars. The Barbapapas build a rocket to go to the red planet. // While travelling to Mars, the Barbapapas meet a family of Barbamartians. They have no time to get acquainted when a giant plant attacks the village.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S2 - EP 212
programme.desc: Barbalala receives a package and discovers little pink animals inside, which she calls the SQUEAKIES.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S1 - EP 113
programme.desc: Zeg is out smashing things with Blaze and AJ when he finds a tiny dinosaur egg. Now the three friends must embark on an epic journey across a prehistoric landscape to return the egg to its Truckodactyl mother.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S1 - EP 114
programme.desc: Blaze and AJ are deep in the woods when they discover and befriend a mud-loving monster truck named Gasquatch. Now, they must set out on an epic adventure to bring their new friend to Mud Fest... the muddiest party of all time.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S10 - EP 1019

programme.title: Millennial Money
programme.desc: Putting the "personal" in personal finance, get an inside look at the lives and finances of millennials. See exactly how much they earn, what they spend it on and how they invest. From starting a business to changing careers, getting in and out of debt, creating an unusual income stream, or casting it all aside to start over again... young people reveal the steps they took to make it happen.

programme.title: Sustainable Future
programme.desc: Sustainable Future is CNBC's umbrella franchise to house explorations and discussions on the most important issue of our time; sustainability. programme.title: Rolex Spirit Of Yachting 2024
programme.desc: Filmed at some of the most idyllic waterside locations, The Spirit of Yachting XXIII series tells the stories behind the races and reveals the passion, emotion and dedication needed to take part in the world’s premier yachting competitions. Featuring the world’s greatest professional sailors and the most committed amateurs at the most desirable sailing locations across the planet.

programme.title: K9 Mounties
programme.desc: When the Royal Canadian Mountain Police Force are in search of a missing person they call in the help of an elite group. The K9 Mounties are rigorously trained to be able to locate those in need in the hardest to reach places. Watch as some of Canada's finest police officers are pushed to the limit in a gruelling 17 week training programme at the PCMP's Police Dog Service Training Centre in Canada.

programme.title: Johnny Kingdom's Wild Countryside
programme.desc: In this series Johnny Kingdom takes us through the enormously varied landscape and wildlife of Exmoor, one of the UK's most glorious national parks.

programme.title: Reality Trip
programme.desc: Follow five young adults as they leave their comfortable lifestyles behind to go on the Reality Trip of a lifetime! Travelling to Sri Lanka, Bangladesh and the Phillippines, the group learn the origins of their favourite brands. From working in cotton fields under a blazing sun, to sleeping on cardboard beds alongside the factory workers; this is a world they were not prepared for. Sparks fly between the group as stress and emotions take over.

programme.title: The World From Above S2
programme.desc: The second series of The World from Above flies across some of the most beautiful and dramatic places in the world. In this series, we float over Venice, find four US presidents carved into the rock at Mount Rushmore, circle over twenty chateaux in the Loire Valley and fly up the Danube to find an enormous temple dedicated to Valhalla.

programme.title: Hopeful Earth
programme.desc: This series travels around the world to meet the people who create the energies of tomorrow through unusual ideas. An extraordinary journey in 8 different countries to unearth imaginative solutions to the present energy and environmental issues.

programme.title: Super Octogenarians
programme.desc: Is 80 the new 50? Super Octogenarians track down some spunky seniors who are working way past their retirement age, and redefining the notion of active ageing. We travel across Asia to witness how these gutsy seniors are debunking the stock images we have of the old, and inspiring all with the tremendous energy they put into their extended professional lives.

programme.title: The Night Shift
programme.desc: A documentary program that discusses about people working at night day. What do they do, why they chose the job, as well how they deal with their lives whose cycle is reversed compared to people in general will be discussed in this program.

programme.title: Duo Backpackers
programme.desc: The journey of two travelers to magnificent hidden places across the islands of Indonesia.

programme.title: The Longest Day
programme.desc: Climate change is more than a set of abstract projections and statistics. It's the daily reality for millions of people across the world, living on the frontlines of the climate crisis. The Longest Day is a snapshot of the climate crisis in action - told through the voices of farmers, health workers, city residents and displaced families.

programme.title: Pridelands Safari
programme.desc: Join Brent Leo Smith and his amazing collegues for highlights from their exciting facinating adventures on the pridelands conservancy in the greater Kruger National Part, South Africa.

programme.title: Trail Town: Down Under
programme.desc: This family-friendly travel show is dedicated to cycling and the great outdoors, and to encouraging more families, couples and friends to explore the world on bicycle.Jump on for the ride of a lifetime as we explore the cycle trails, mountain bike parks, natural beauty and cuisine that Australia and New Zealand has to offer.

programme.title: Side Walk
programme.desc: This program discusses the traditional food with its history, by bringing chefs from some restaurants / hotels that create innovations from the cuisine. Guided by a host who has experience and interest in the field of culinary specialities, Side Walk is an alternative entertainment program in the form of information on regional cuisine that has never been timeless.

programme.title: Earth On Edge
programme.desc: Documentary series about the climate crisis. We travel to Iceland, Greenland, Denmark, Japan and California to explore the effects of a warming planet. While the situation is dire, there is hope. Brilliant minds are coming up with solutions that could show us a new way. As we stand on the edge, what is our next step?

programme.desc: A religious program that preached by Abu Marlo. He is a former magician that currently become an Indonesian motivator.

Guided by an interactive and excellent host in preparing home-cooked meals, so that the audience can easily do it at home.

programme.title: Wellness Stories
programme.desc: Inspires people to relate to the emotion of the moment. Captures the wellness of life and the excitement of doing a healthy lifestyle. Spread spirit and happiness. Wellness is related to local wisdom too.

programme.title: Star Life
programme.desc: A high-energy infotainment program that seamlessly blends the latest from the global celebrity landscape with the hottest local Indonesian stars and social media influencers. The show's mission is to dissect and serve up all things trendy and zeitgeisty, ensuring a rollercoaster ride of entertainment and information.

programme.title: All About Women
programme.desc: This program is a kind of story rubric that is a friend to women, especially in Indonesia and Southeast Asia in general. There will still be a part of the local wisdom but adjusted to the coverage.

programme.title: Space Of Mine
programme.desc: Everyone dreams of having a dream home. A dream home doesn't have to be big and grand, but the most important thing is that it is comfortable and fits the owner's personality. This program will provide inspiration from people's stories about their unique homes.

programme.title: The Travel Note S5
programme.desc: The Travel Note is a light travel program that discusses about tourist attractions, which includes history, culture, variety culinary there and also the comfortable and affordable hotel. Presented by a young, attractive and dynamic host. The Travel Note also provides some tips and tricks to the audiences.

programme.title: The $100 Nomad
programme.desc: Got a weekend, an adventurous spirit and a hundred dollars? We fly Xenia, Fauzi and Zhin to 10 unexplored destinations with only $100 for food, activities and lodging. By chasing unreal landscapes and spending nights at unlikely abodes where no tourists go, the $100 nomads prove that budget stands in no way of a grand adventure.

programme.title: Factory Story
programme.desc: Food or goods that we encounter in everyday life without us realizing it go through a long process. Machines and hands that work hard behind the manufacture of a food, drink or goods are the main factors for the success of a product

programme.title: Beyond The Barn
programme.desc: Beyond The Barn wants the program to invite the audience to look beyond traditional livestock farming, by highlighting the business potential that can be generated. For example, cowhide produced from the farm can be used as raw material for leather shoes, showing how creativity can turn agricultural or livestock products into profitable businesses.

programme.title: Wild Cage
programme.desc: Indonesia's wildlife is incredibly diverse, with a variety of unique and spectacular wildlife living in Indonesia. Indonesia is home to many endemic species, and the existence of these endemic species is very important and part of our identity, as all creatures play an important role in maintaining the balance of Indonesia's wild ecosystems.

programme.title: Wild Things
programme.desc: Our landscape has changed dramatically over the last 50 years.Wild plants, bushes and trees have disappeared, and strange new plants have become familiar.With big, bold experiments and innovative approaches this series offers a colourful and engaging window onto our natural environment and reveals what the future may hold for biodiversity everywhere.

programme.title: Dingo Untamed
programme.desc: Dingo is an award winning Discovery Channel and YouTube Wildlife conservationist and adventurer whose various social media platform reach in excess of 200 million viewers every year. Through these videos, Dingo actively strives to create a lasting connection between people and animals in the hope that this connection can in turn help to save them.

programme.title: The Wild Bunch
programme.desc: Shot on location with stunning cinematography, The Wild Bunch offers an intimate insight into Africa's most threatened species. Travelling across South Africa, through wild bush, high grassland and arid mountaintops, each episode is freestanding; focusing on the challenges or conflicts of a particular animal.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the world’s top stories as they happen. programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and "accepted wisdom" to find the real story. You won’t find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today’s world.

programme.title: Africa Live
programme.desc: Africa Live is a news program that focuses on African issues and issues related to this diverse continent. CGTN’s Nairobi-based broadcast center produces Africa Live. programme.title: Talk Africa

programme.title: A Beautiful Mind - EP 7
programme.desc: Hyunsung Hospital is the best national hospital with the most advanced medical techniques. Although it is obvious that it is the safest place to be in the country, something mysterious is happening inside the hospital. What is the truth? Who is the criminal? Lee Yeongo is an elite neurosurgeon. He may win recognition from the patients but when he is alone, he feels empty deep in the mind. There is no compassion or emotion for him. Could we think of him as good?

programme.desc: This programme goes hot on the heels of the biggest happenings in society and the entertainment scene, bringing you the latest scoops.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 2432
programme.desc: Hung Shu-Kan owns a logistics business. The only thing on his mind is the well-being of his three daughters. His eldest daughter has moved abroad, but his second youngest daughter, Yuek-Shui, is still single. She and her little sister Sum-Yue often squabble, putting their father in a dilemma.

programme.title: Call Of Destiny - EP 1
programme.desc: Fang Ri Jin unexpectedly connects with Xing Ke Lan, who is in a future timeline and trapped in a crisis. Is fate already predetermined? Will Ri Jin choose to compromise, or will he take a leap of faith to rewrite the destiny?

programme.title: Darkside Of The Moon - EP 19
programme.desc: Yue Moon-yuet appears to be a glamorous and skilled crisis management expert, but she has a tragic past. Eighteen years ago, she and her sister were assaulted by wealthy heir Cheung Kei-tsun, leading to a devastating upheaval in her family.

programme.title: Connecting Earth And Sky
programme.desc: This show invites well-known artists from different industries to step out of their comfort zones and embark on a journey full of challenges and surprises.

programme.title: EXTRA
programme.desc: Keep up with the news on the entertainment circle in Hong Kong and all over the world, with reports on the latest drama series, movies, concert highlights, award ceremonies and more.

programme.title: News Roundup
programme.desc: A round-up of the news before the day ends.

programme.title: Global View
programme.desc: Bringing you the news from Hong Kong, the mainland and around the world every day.

programme.title: The Escape of the Seven: Resurrection - EP 10
programme.desc: Do Hyuk returns from the dead seeking revenge after being framed as a murderer. The seven wicked associates regroup for a renewed game of vengeance. Some seek revenge, others power, and some conceal their true motives in a new game of deceit and betrayal. How will the fates of the Seven reborn from lies end?

programme.title: Side Story Of Fox Volant - EP 30
programme.desc: Hu Fei steps up to avenge his father's death, transforming from a brave, reckless teen into a hero among his generation, caring about the common people and serving communities all across the country. However, things get complicated when he falls for that same warlord's daughter, the stunning Yuan Zi Yi.

programme.title: Vista of China (Sr.17) - EP 67
programme.desc: Through the program, explore the different development and new features of the Chinese nation from different perspectives, and understand Chinese culture in ancient and modern China and abroad.

programme.title: Sky is the Limit, The - EP 10
programme.desc: CHOW KWOK CHING (Lam Bowie) was a disorderly guy with no ambitions. Though he was in his thirties, he did not have a career and changed jobs constantly. Under his mother’s pressure, CHING determined to join the police force. He did not do his work very well and finally was assigned to Sha Tau Kok where the border is. Meanwhile, CHING had misunderstanding with a mainland girl KAM LAN (Cheung Ho Yee, Maggie). He even perceived LAN as a bad woman and considered her as a sign of misfortune to him.

programme.title: Life Made Simple - EP 7
programme.desc: TING SHEUNG WONG (KWOK CHUN ON) is a 30 years old man with the IQ of a seven years old boy. Ironically, he is surely happier than anyone else._x000D__x000D_ WONG’s simple life ends when his best friend from childhood, WONG KEI FUNG CATHERINE (HSUAN JESSICA HESTER), goes to the U.S. to study. In order to realise FUNG’s dream of studying abroad, WONG gives her all his savings. She works at the Chung’s International Company Limited after her study.

programme.title: Life Made Simple - EP 8

programme.title: My Ages Apart - EP 15
programme.desc: Mentor and mentee, SUNG CHUNG-KEI (Bobby Au Yeung) and KWONG KONG-SANG (Moses Chan), are highly-regarded bankers. To move up the corporate ladder, KONG-SANG deliberately transfers CHUNG-KEI out, but the plane CHUNG-KEI takes crashes. After regaining his consciousness, CHUNG-KEI finds himself trapped in the body of a millennial named BAO PAU (James Ng).

programme.title: Life Made Simple - EP 10
programme.desc: TING SHEUNG WONG (KWOK CHUN ON) is a 30 years old man with the IQ of a seven years old boy. Ironically, he is surely happier than anyone else._x000D__x000D_ WONG’s simple life ends when his best friend from childhood, WONG KEI FUNG CATHERINE (HSUAN JESSICA HESTER), goes to the U.S. to study. In order to realise FUNG’s dream of studying abroad, WONG gives her all his savings. She works at the Chung’s International Company Limited after her study.

programme.title: My Ages Apart - EP 17
programme.desc: Mentor and mentee, SUNG CHUNG-KEI (Bobby Au Yeung) and KWONG KONG-SANG (Moses Chan), are highly-regarded bankers. To move up the corporate ladder, KONG-SANG deliberately transfers CHUNG-KEI out, but the plane CHUNG-KEI takes crashes. After regaining his consciousness, CHUNG-KEI finds himself trapped in the body of a millennial named BAO PAU (James Ng).

programme.title: My Ages Apart - EP 18
programme.desc: Mentor and mentee, SUNG CHUNG-KEI (Bobby Au Yeung) and KWONG KONG-SANG (Moses Chan), are highly-regarded bankers. To move up the corporate ladder, KONG-SANG deliberately transfers CHUNG-KEI out, but the plane CHUNG-KEI takes crashes. After regaining his consciousness, CHUNG-KEI finds himself trapped in the body of a millennial named BAO PAU (James Ng).

programme.title: Vista of China (Sr.17) - EP 68
programme.desc: Through the program, explore the different development and new features of the Chinese nation from different perspectives, and understand Chinese culture in ancient and modern China and abroad.

programme.title: Sky is the Limit, The - EP 11
programme.desc: CHOW KWOK CHING (Lam Bowie) was a disorderly guy with no ambitions. Though he was in his thirties, he did not have a career and changed jobs constantly. Under his mother’s pressure, CHING determined to join the police force. He did not do his work very well and finally was assigned to Sha Tau Kok where the border is. Meanwhile, CHING had misunderstanding with a mainland girl KAM LAN (Cheung Ho Yee, Maggie). He even perceived LAN as a bad woman and considered her as a sign of misfortune to him.

programme.title: Life Made Simple - EP 9
programme.desc: TING SHEUNG WONG (KWOK CHUN ON) is a 30 years old man with the IQ of a seven years old boy. Ironically, he is surely happier than anyone else._x000D__x000D_ WONG’s simple life ends when his best friend from childhood, WONG KEI FUNG CATHERINE (HSUAN JESSICA HESTER), goes to the U.S. to study. In order to realise FUNG’s dream of studying abroad, WONG gives her all his savings. She works at the Chung’s International Company Limited after her study.
